channel.title: Only I can't connect to my server? [I'M NOT IP BANNED]
channel.description:
NOTE: My server is on a VPS Well I load my client and type in my username and pass and login. It begins to load and gets stuck on a black screen. I've done the following: [code]Reset my Router Reset my Modem Restarted my Computer Reset my 192.168.1.1 to factory defaults Reset my Local Connection[/code]
Any help? Still doesn't work.

item.title: Only I can't connect to my server? [I'M NOT IP BANNED]
item.dc:creator: @frostscapeserver frostscapeserver
item.description:
@frostscapeserver wrote:

NOTE: My server is on a VPS
Well I load my client and type in my username and pass and login. It begins to load and gets stuck on a black screen.
I’ve done the following:

Reset my Router Reset my Modem Restarted my Computer Reset my 192.168.1.1 to factory defaults Reset my Local Connection

Any help? Still doesn’t work.

Read full topic
